problems.title: Same Number Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern where each row contains the same number repeated, starting from 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a number triangle with N rows. Each row should print the row number repeated as many times as the row number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
1
22
333
4444
55555

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
22
333
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints the row number repeated for the current row number of times.
